item.title: MØst@Xeon:~# whoami
item.description: A Computer Science student that wears a hat! I’m interested in technology generally and in hacking and development particulary. In this small space, I will share write-ups for CTF challenges and talk about some topics and my experience in order to document what I learn and share knowledge that might help others. You can find me on Hackthebox here or reach out to me via the socials below Happy hacking!!

item.title: Scrambled
item.description: Initial Recon Nmap Starting with a full tcp port scan we got the below results $ nmap -vvv -p- -A -oN nmap/tcp-all.txt 10.10.11.168 Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.168 Host is up, received syn-ack (0.084s latency). Scanned at 2022-09-20 03:50:10 EEST for 512s Not shown: 65513 filtered tcp ports (no-response) PORT STATE SERVICE REASON VERSION 53/tcp open domain syn-ack Simple DNS Plus 80/tcp open http syn-ack Microsoft IIS httpd 10.0 |_http-title: Scramble Corp Intranet |_http-server-header: Microsoft-IIS/10.
